author: tedyu
msg: HBASE-4138  If zookeeper.znode.parent is not specifed explicitly in Client
code then HTable object loops continuously waiting for the root region
by using /hbase as the base node.(ramkrishna.s.vasudevan)

author: rickhall
msg: Revert some refactoring that removed the bundle reference from the listener info
object, since there are some corner cases where the bundle context becomes
invalid and we can no longer reach the bundle. (FELIX-3056)
